name: Sloppy Goat
description:
Sloppy goat

All the little goats like to climb the hills, but it's no secret that the probability of breaking into the abyss is very high. Help the unfortunate goat to get out of the pit, using falling boxes, which are eager to put the sloppy animal in an awkward position.

Game features:
- 3 different locations
- 30 levels of varying difficulty
- Old school gameplay
- Pixel art graphics
